name: Friends Like These
description: Mudd has been revealed! He's built a ship capable of time travel and has stationed himself with several dozen of his friends near the temporal anomaly. Fight through the enemy ships to reach Mudd and stop his nefarious plans!
rules:
— In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
— There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
— Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using any version of Mudd, Burnham, Chekov, Timekepper Tenavik, Discovery Crew, or crew with matching Battle Traits, will provide a bonus.
— Using the Val Jean, U.S.S. Defiant, or U.S.S. Shenzhou will provide a bonus to hull.
— Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Mudd, Burnham, Chekov, Tenavik or Discovery Crew

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

ship.name: Val Jean
ship.flavor: A Maquis raider commanded by Chakotay. This vessel was destroyed after colliding with the Caretaker's array.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

next_threshold_rewards.name: Credits
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

screens.text: "I must say, Captain, your tracking abilities are right up there with the greatest hound. Being found here on the precipice of my greatest escapade is mildly disappointing. I'd hoped to reach the execution phase before discovery, but alas."

"As I said, it doesn't really matter either way. My compatriots are getting into position and after that the rest will be history. We just have to hold out a short while longer, and there's a lot more of us than of you."
"Mudd, by the authority of the Starfleet, you're ordered to stand down. I promise you... the kind of power at play could tear you apart."
"Either he didn't receive that, Captain, or he didn't care. Several of his ships have changed course and are headed right for us with weapons charged."

"As I said, it doesn't really matter either way. My compatriots are getting into position and after that the rest will be history. We just have to hold out a short while longer, and there's a lot more of us than of you."
"Mudd, by the authority of the Starfleet, you're ordered to stand down. I promise you... the kind of power at play could tear you apart."
"Either he didn't receive that, Captain, or he didn't care. Several of his ships have changed course and are headed right for us with weapons charged."
